Actions.Name: Execute Webhook
Actions.Description: This request executes a webhook by using a webhook id and token.

Actions.Name: Get Current User
Actions.Description: Returns the user object of the requestors account.

Actions.Name: Get Current User Guilds
Actions.Description: Returns a list of partial guild objects the current user is a member of.

Actions.Name: Get User Connections
Actions.Description: Returns a list of connection objects.
